title: Taxi App (like Uber) for a specific geography
snippet:
I need someone to help me work on creating an iOS taxi like app (think Uber!) for a specific geography. We are two EDM loving young investor-backed entrepreneurs in Greece with experience in the sector and the App will primarily be used in the tourist industry.

We will need it to have a 1) customer facing aspect and a 2) driver facing aspect. Moreover, we will need data collection and databases to be presented on a 3) dashboard for our business. We will require both backend and front end coding solutions. We would like it to be coded in Swift. All code will belong to us.

This app will use:  
card.io and Braintree for payments processing
Mapkit & Google Maps API for routing and maps + GSMGeocoder
Core Location for getting Customer location
Apple Push Notifications for notifications

We will need someone who can:
Create the final wireframe
Create a fully functioning booking system 
Create a fully interactive Customer, Driving and Dashboard system
Create a basic AI which assigns bookings to the nearest free driver
Create an automated database for bookings, transactions, customer info and other criterion

Must be available to provide support during pre and post launch.

Please let us know if there are any questions or clarifications needed. 

All prospective developers are requested to include a bio on themselves, a portfolio, proposed technical solution, provisional timeline and pricing structure (we expect it to be tied to agreed milestones). Moreover, tell us a bit about yourselves as we are looking for someone/a team which will have a long term relationship. We are open to various solutions.

We look forward to hearing from you!
